text: Shaun Roger White (born September 3, 1986 in San Diego, California, United States.) is an American professional snowboarder and skateboarder. He is a two-time Olympic gold medalist. He holds the X Games records for gold medals and highest overall medal count. He has also won 10 ESPY Awards. Nowadays he is a professional snowboarder and skateboarder. He still holds the world record for the most Olympic gold medals in halfpipe snowboarding with a total of three gold medals. He began snowboarding at 5 years old at snow summit. Shaun is immensely proud of the earliest Olympic gold medal he earned in 2006 White was born in San Diego, California on September 3, 1986. title: Shaun White
